headline: Smooth writing pens at a great price.
review: I had run out of pens and due to the lockdown, the stationary shops were closed. I am used to writing with ball pens, but nevertheless decided to buy these. These pens are really good. They are light and comfortable to write with. Also they write smoothly and unlike most ball pens they do not stop writing half way. They write properly till the end of the refill. Only downside is you cannot write very fast with it. The price also is good. Please go ahead and buy them if you are in need of good pens.

headline: A nice looking colorful set of blue gel pens
review: I really love octane classmate gel pens they are cost effective colorful and the best part of it is its ink which is much deep blue compare to other gel pens that available in the market right now. It's gives a feeling of Add gel which I used when I was in my school. Added to this it comes in a nice neon colors and it also got a rubber grip which helps to have a good hold while writing. Overall it's a value for money and I am really happy that Amazon make this product eligible for prime customer. So as a prime customer I can only oder this one without giving any extra delivery charge.

headline: These are not neon colored pens...only body is neon
review: Its quite obvious the seller has written a factually incorrect description to grab attention. No where in the description is it mentioned that it writes in blue ink. Only the body is neon color, they all write in blue ink. The first statement itself is a lie..and that too purposely written so. Because by the time you buy it, the amount is too less for you to return it. Pls give this guy a very low rating for all the parameters. Whenever anyone posts a purposely wrong description, pls give lowest rating

headline: I bought regular blue gel pens

I bought it, so i bought it!
